title: A Page from history
creator_credit: Krishna Gopal, M. Bhavnani and Documentary Films of India
brief_description: The buildings of the dynasty of Bijapur, founded in 1489 and finally defeated in 1686. Portraits of the sultans introduce a study of the forts, temples, palaces, mausoleums and pavilions in which each sought to outdo his predecessor in splendid architecture and sculpture.
